title: Love it!
text: This cleanser is amazing. My skin feels so soft and hydrated. No irritation at all.

title: Good product
text: Works well but a bit expensive. My skin feels clean.

title: Caused breakouts
text: This gave me acne. Stopped using after a week.

title: Perfect for sensitive skin
text: No fragrance. Gentle. My rosacea improved.

title: Just okay
text: Nothing special. Didn't break me out but didn't wow me.

title: Holy grail
text: This moisturizer is incredible. Gel texture absorbs quickly.

title: Good for dry skin
text: My flaky skin is gone. Hydrating without being greasy.

title: Broke me out
text: Got cystic acne from this. Stopped using.

title: Game changer
text: My pores are smaller. Oil production reduced significantly.

title: Works well
text: Good product for the price. Helps with texture.

title: Irritation
text: Burned my skin. Redness and itching. Had to wash off.

title: Favorite moisturizer
text: Rich but not heavy. Perfect for dry sensitive skin.

title: Good
text: Pricey but good. Ceramides help my barrier.

title: Just fine
text: Not worth the hype. My Cetaphil works just as well.

title: Classic
text: Been using for years. Never irritates. Does the job.

title: Too basic
text: Doesn't remove makeup well. Leaves residue.
